SELECT c.user_no , c.confirm_no , c.chall_no , ( select f.file_path from files f where f.file_code_no = c.confirm_no
and rownum < 2 ) as file_path
FROM chall_confirm c WHERE c.chall_no = #{challNo} ORDER BY c.confirm_no DESC

SELECT c.confirm_no , u.nickname , u.user_no , c.chall_no , c.confirm_content , c.confirm_createAt ,(SELECT count(confirm_no) FROM chall_confirm_like WHERE confirm_no = c.confirm_no ) as cntLike ,(SELECT count(confirm_no) FROM chall_confirm_reply WHERE confirm_no = c.confirm_no ) as cntReply FROM chall_confirm c JOIN users u ON c.user_no = u.user_no WHERE c.confirm_no = #{confirmNo} AND c.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT r.confirm_reply_no , r.confirm_reply_content , r.confirm_reply_createAt , u.user_no , u.nickname , r.confirm_no FROM chall_confirm_reply r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.user_no = u.user_no WHERE r.confirm_no = #{confirmNo} ORDER BY r.confirm_reply_no DESC
